title: Introduction to C
body: This course provides a solid foundation in programming concepts. Learn the fundamentals of coding in language C.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
body: Uncover Algorithmic Insights: Establish a firm foundation in algorithmic concepts with our 'Introduction to Algorithms' course.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
body: Unveiling C++ for Data Structures and Algorithms: Begin your journey with our 'Introduction to C++ for DSA' course.

title: Basic Data Structures
body: Exploring Foundational Data Structures: Delve into the basics with our 'Basic Data Structures' course.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
body: Python's OOP Odyssey: Dive into Object-Oriented Programming with our 'Introduction to OOP Python' course.

title: Software Engineering
body: Engineering Digital Solutions: Embark on your software engineering journey with our comprehensive course.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
body: Mastering the Cloud: Elevate your expertise in AWS and Cloud Computing with our specialized course.

title: Database (MySQL)
body: Database Proficiency: Unlock the world of databases with our 'MySQL Database' course, and dive into the heart of data management.

title: Problem-Solving Part
body: Mastering Problem-Solving: Elevate your critical thinking and analytical skills in our specialized 'Problem-Solving Part' course.
